name: Flicking Heroes
description:
Flicking Heroes is a weird physics-based and turn-based and semi-text-based dungeon crawler, inspired by Into the Breach, Monster Strike and boardgame Catacombs.

In this game, you control a team of three heroes, work together to fight monsters, level up, choose talents, and face the final boss.

Meet the team:

Archer (￣∧￣)=)→

She reciprocates teammate's protection with incredible bow skills.

Warrior |⊃'0'|⊃

Despite being heavy armored, he can chaaaaarge!

Assassin \(￢_￢)-+---

Once prepared, he reaps down all monsters in a single round.

(More heroes will be added in later updates.)

Developer:

Artless Games (Yet Another Puzzle Platformer and Yet Another Pushing Puzzler)
